alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southeastern Grady, Thomas and western Brooks Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Thomasville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Alma, Dills, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Merrillville, Pisgah Church, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Dixie, Moncrief and Festus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
